p: Fresh okra pods were washed and dried in a dehydrator at 55–60°C for 24 hr. After drying, grinding was done and okra powder was passed through a 20‐µm mesh size sieve and stored in polythene bags placed in an airtight jar. Overnight extraction was carried out by using 96% ethanol, and the extract was concentrated by using a rotary evaporator at 40°C (Alqasoumi, 2012). The percentage yield obtained was 13% w/w.
